Reviews.Title: I returned this since instructions were not in English
Reviews.Author: CA Dreamin
Reviews.Content: I was so excited to get this camera after researching which Casio to buy. It arrived quickly however all instructions for use were in Japanese. Im sure its a good camera I just would like to have my instructions in English. They should disclose this.

ProductInfo.Features:
Effective pixels:   16M CCD
Optical zoom:   5 times
Focal length:   26 mm - 130 mm
Liquid crystal:   2.7 type (230,000 pixels)
ProductInfo.Name: Casio Exilim EX-ZS6 Digital Camera Silver EX-ZS6SR
